Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small ComplementedLattices AllSmallComplementedLattices is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic ComplementedLattices of orders 2 to 8.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallComplementedLattices">
The output complementedlattices are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small ComplementedLattices
"IsASmallComplementedLattices" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic ComplementedLattices of orders 2 to 8. It returns true if the model is a Small ComplementedLattices, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallComplementedLattices">
